title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When selecting Close All Saved from the file menu, the file f1.txt is not always closed, even though no changes have been made.
OB: Closing all saved files from the file menu should close the file f1.txt when no changes have been made.
EB: Closing all saved files from the file menu does not close the file f1.txt when no changes have been made.
SR:
Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, perform the following steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Select Close All Saved from the file menu.
